name: Analogical Reasoning & Symmetric/Inverse Relations
description: Tests ANALOGICAL reasoning, symmetric relations (MARRIED_TO, SIBLING_OF), inverse relations (PARENT_OF/CHILD_OF), and pattern matching with FACTS_MATCHING

theory.natural_language: Family relations: Maria is married to Ion. Marriage is symmetric - if Maria is married to Ion, then Ion is married to Maria. Maria is the parent of Ana. Ion is also the parent of Ana. Ana is the sibling of Mihai. Maria is the parent of Mihai. Parent-child is an inverse relation - if Maria is parent of Ana, then Ana is child of Maria. Geography with capitals: Bucharest is the capital of Romania. Paris is the capital of France. Berlin is the capital of Germany. Madrid is the capital of Spain. Rome is the capital of Italy. London is the capital of United Kingdom. Professional analogies: Doctor treats patients. Teacher teaches students. Lawyer represents clients. Chef cooks food.

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes, Ion is married to Maria. This is inferred from the symmetric property of MARRIED_TO - since Maria is married to Ion, Ion is also married to Maria.
expected_answer.explanation: Symmetric relation inference: MARRIED_TO is symmetric

queries.natural_language: Is Ana a child of Maria?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes, Ana is the child of Maria. This is inferred from the inverse relation - since Maria is parent of Ana, Ana is child of Maria.
expected_answer.explanation: Inverse relation inference: CHILD_OF is inverse of PARENT_OF

queries.natural_language: Is Mihai a sibling of Ana?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes, Mihai is a sibling of Ana. SIBLING_OF is symmetric, so if Ana is sibling of Mihai, then Mihai is sibling of Ana.
expected_answer.explanation: Symmetric relation inference: SIBLING_OF is symmetric

queries.natural_language: Bucharest is to Romania as Paris is to what?

expected_answer.natural_language: France. The analogy is: Bucharest is the capital of Romania, so Paris (being a capital) is the capital of France.
expected_answer.explanation: Analogical reasoning: A:B :: C:D pattern with CAPITAL_OF relation

queries.natural_language: Doctor is to patient as teacher is to what?

expected_answer.natural_language: Student. The analogy is: Doctor treats patient, so teacher (in the same professional pattern) teaches student.
expected_answer.explanation: Analogical reasoning: professional role to served entity pattern

expected_answer.natural_language: Found 6 pairs: Bucharest-Romania, Paris-France, Berlin-Germany, Madrid-Spain, Rome-Italy, London-United Kingdom.
expected_answer.explanation: Pattern matching with wildcards returns all matching facts

queries.natural_language: Who are the children of Ion?

expected_answer.natural_language: Ion has two children: Ana and Mihai.
expected_answer.explanation: Pattern matching to find all objects of PARENT_OF relation

expected_answer.natural_language: Ana's parents are Maria and Ion.
expected_answer.explanation: Pattern matching to find all subjects with PARENT_OF Ana
